text:
CB246/3 NEWYORK 3CH00LEY AMES IOWA
1939 -SEP
ADVANTAGE OF THE APPEARANCES OF THE MANY OUTSTANDING ORCHESTRAL
MUSICAL EDUCATIONAL AND CULTURAL ORGANIZATIONS IN THE EAST AND
THE PRESENCE OF MANY PROMINENT VISITORS FROM ABROAD SO THAT BY
SHORT WAVE AND BY REBROADCASTING THEY MAY GIVE OF THEIR TALENTS
TO THE COMMUNITIES WHICH YOU SERVE
! PM 2
F H LAGUARDIA MAYOR
